release.change: Fixed keypad layout issue on some devices
Added 3 new converters in Specialized section: Ring Size, Shoe Size - Men, Shoe Size - Women
Improved look and feel of popup keypad (can be turned off in preferences)
Renamed Velocity/Speed to just Speed (to be more correct)
Added higher res launcher icon for Android 4.4 (Kit Kat)
Added in-app purchase of full currency list (169 currencies)
Updated preferences with new options formerly only found in Unit Converter Plus (formatting, etc.)
Updated UI to modern Holo style for ICS and above
Added "Rate Me" dialog... consider rating this app if you like it
Fixed a bug in German translation
Added back in Samsung Multi-Window (for devices that support it)
Bug fix (temporarily removing Samsung multi-window support)
Added support for Samsung Multi-Window (for devices that support it)
New Pop-Up Keypad (can be turned off in preferences)
Added a few new UK units to Volume converter
Added clear button on input text to easily clear its value
Added quick-list button on converter for easier access (can be turned off in preferences)
Added complete changelog history in About screen and Preferences
Quick List now available on Favorites
Added Roman Numerals to Number Unit Converter
New formatting option for Imperial units as requested (i.e. 1' - 4", 6lb 4oz) Foot, Pounds and Stones (so far)...(it can be turned off in pref)
Added option to show result description below result box (i.e. 1 Foot = 12 Inches)
Added menu option to toggle list filter (instead of removing filter, just turn it on/off)
Improved Fraction to Decimal converter (allow free input of fraction)
Added Error Log viewer to help troubleshoot errors (also found in preferences)
Added a couple of new requested units in a couple categories
Added 2 new categories: Light - Illuminance, Viscosity - Kinematic
Added Data Size (JEDEC) conversion (as requested by many users) that uses the more common naming convention for Kilobyte (1024B), Megabyte (1024KB), etc... where all prefixes are base 2
Added support for Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
Added 5 new categories: Electric Current, Flow Rate - Mass, Flow Rate - Volume, Radiation Absorbed Dose, Radiation Equivalent Dose
Added a note at bottom of Data Converters that reiterates the use of SI Decimal/IEC Binary prefix naming convention and provides a link to Wikipedia article
Reworked the Data Size category to use the SI decimal/IEC Binary prefixes (after many requests)
Added some new units in several categories
Maintenance release. Added a few units in several categories and bug fixes
Localized for United Kingdom (i.e. Litre, Metre, Favourites, etc.)
To and From selections are now remembered (instead of using arbitrary default values)
Improved the decimal to fraction converter
Added Decimal to Fraction converter (under specialized menu)
Added swap to/from button on the screen (still available from menu)
Added new units in several categories
Show the base exchange rate between the selected currencies on the Currency screen (as requested)
Added a new "What's New" dialog that shows the first time after an update
New filter option in preference to show/hide conversions
Localized to German, Italian and Spanish (thanks to all who helped translate!)
Added some missing units and fixed a typo
Added a Specialized category for requested specialized conversions
Bug fix for currency conversion on some devices
Minor fixes and reduced file size
Added Number Base Conversions (Binary, Hex, etc...)
Option to trim trailing zeros (on by default)
New input method for larger number buttons
New Quick List View (new menu item on conversion screen)
Added Inch H20 and Ft H2O (Pressure)
Calculate button now closes the soft keyboard (if it's open)
Added Knots and Move to SD card (available for Android 2.2 users)
